tooltip.showComparissonToPreviousYear: The arrows show the changes (improvement, deterioration or neutral) compared to the previous year. If "n/a" appears, a comparisson with the previous year is not possible (due to i.e. missing data).

assessment.red: Recommendation to speak with responsible Manager
assessment.yellow: Please be aware of employee's performance evaluation
assessment.headerInfo:
The assesment is based on the SuccessFactors input of Overall Performance Rating, High Risk of Loss and High Impact of Loss.
If at least two of them are evaluated either "Yes" or "Exceeds Expectations", the assesment turns red.
If one of them does have this evaluation, the assesment turns yellow.
If neither is true, the assesment turns green.
If the employee is unrated in PMGM the assessment is grey.
